mapper.select: select id, payment_createtime as 'paymentCreatetime', payment_expiration_date as 'paymentExpirationDate', payment_no as 'paymentNo', hand_in_id as 'handInId', payment_renewals as 'paymentRenewals' from p_payment_list
mapper.insert: insert into p_payment_list (payment_createtime, payment_expiration_date, payment_no,hand_in_id,payment_renewals) values (#{paymentCreatetime},#{paymentExpirationDate},#{paymentNo},#{handInId},#{paymentRenewals})
